intro: Outsmart your parents and escape their watchful eyes!
description:
In SchoolBoy Simulator, you're stuck at home after a bad grade and your parents are giving you a hard time. They’ve locked you in, and now it’s up to you to sneak around, outsmart them, and escape to hang out with your friends.

Move quietly, solve puzzles, and find clever ways to avoid getting caught by your overbearing parents. Every sound counts—be careful not to make a mistake!

With stealth, strategy, and a bit of luck, can you break free and reclaim your freedom? It’s all about staying smart and staying silent in this intense, sneaky adventure!
